summary.span: 支持 控件并提供一个接口，使数据绑定控件可以执行 LINQ 数据操作。

span.span: Supports the control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform LINQ data operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类主要用于数据绑定控件，而不是页代码中的可编程对象。The class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code. 页面开发人员通常使用 控件与数据进行交互。Page developers typically use the control to interact with data. ASP.NET 数据源控件包含一个或多个数据列表，由数据源视图对象表示。ASP.NET data source controls contain one or more lists of data, represented by data source view objects. 类扩展 类。The class extends the class. 它定义与其关联的控件的功能 ，并实现数据源控件的基本数据功能。It defines the capabilities of the control with which it is associated, and it implements the basic data functionality for the data source control. 类实现 、[更新]()、[插入]()和[删除]()操作。The class implements the , [Update](), [Insert](), and [Delete]() operations. 它还实现了排序、筛选和管理保存在视图状态中的设置。It also implements sorting, filtering, and managing settings that are kept in view state. 尽管 对象不是直接向页面开发人员公开的，但它的许多属性和方法都可以通过 控件访问。Although the object is not directly exposed to page developers, many of its properties and methods can be accessed through the control. 控件实现以下数据检索方法和事件，并通过关联的控件向页面开发人员和其他调用方公开它们 ：The control implements the following data retrieval methods and events and exposes them to page developers and to other callers through the associated control: - 属性。The property. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法。The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法。The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. - 方法。The method. - 事件。The event. - 事件。The event. 可以通过添加子句来对通过控件检索的数据进行排序 `OrderBy` 。You can sort the data that you retrieve with the control by adding an `OrderBy` clause. 可以 通过设置 传递给方法的对象的属性，为实例提供一个排序表达式 。You can provide a sort expression for the instance by setting the property of the object that is passed to the method. 属性的语法与 属性的语法相同 。The syntax for the property is the same as the syntax for a property. 控件实现 接口，并使用视图状态在页请求之间跟踪其状态。The control implements the interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests. 提供属性和 、和方法的实现， 以便为 控件启用视图状态跟踪。Implementations of the property and the , , and methods are provided to enable view-state tracking for the control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，将指定的 控件设置为当前视图的所有者。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the specified control as the owner of the current view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数由[GetView]()方法调用，以返回具有指定参数的数据源视图的新实例 `name` 。The constructor is called by the [LinqDataSource.GetView]() method to return a new instance of a data source view with the specified `name` parameter. 一次只能有一个 对象与一个 控件关联。Only one object is associated with a control at a time. 对象的名称 始终为 `DefaultView` ，但此命名限制由 控件而不是控件施加 。The name of the object is always `DefaultView`, although this naming restriction is imposed by the control, not by the control. 可以重写 [GetView]() 方法，以支持使用其他命名约定的视图。You can override the [LinqDataSource.GetView]() method to support views that use a different naming convention. `context` 数据源视图使用参数传递的实例访问参数集合。The instance that is passed by the `context` parameter is used by the data source view to access parameter collections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使数据显示控件不使用分页，对象也始终支持分页。The object always supports paging even if the data presentation control does not use paging. 当 [LinqDataSourceView]() 属性设置为时 `false` ，你可以手动在事件中对数据进行分页 。When the [LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]() property is set to `false`, you can manually page the data in the event.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与当前 控件相关联的 对象除支持检索数据外，是否还支持检索数据行的总数。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object that is associated with the current control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to retrieving the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件使用可以分页的总行数来确定如何呈现分页控件。Data-bound controls use the total number of rows that can be paged to determine how to render paging controls. 例如，此值用于确定要在控件页导航器中呈现的数字页导航按钮数 。For example, this value is used to determine how many numeric pager buttons to render in a control pager. 如果 [LinqDataSourceView]() 属性设置为 `false` ，则必须手动设置事件中的总行数 。If the [LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage]() property is set to `false`, you must manually set the total row count in the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is primarily used by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). `LoadViewState`方法 从方法保存的上一个页请求还原对象的视图状态信息 。The `LoadViewState` method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function SaveViewState () As Object
protected: virtual System::Object ^ SaveViewState();

summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后 控件的视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves the changes to view state for the control since the time that the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含对 控件的视图状态所做更改的对象；如果没有与对象关联的视图状态，则为 null（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the control's view state, or null (Nothing in Visual Basic) if there is no view state associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 `SaveViewState` 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The `SaveViewState` method is primarily used by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件属性值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of the properties for a server control. 这些值将自动添加到 服务器控件的属性中，该属性是类的实例 。These values are automatically added to the property of the server control, which is an instance of the class. 服务器控件的值随后将保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。The value for the server control is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control life cycle. 保存视图状态后，在服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后保存的字符串对象将作为 HTML 隐藏元素呈现给浏览器。When view state is saved, the string object that was persisted after the save-state stage of the server control life cycle is rendered to the browser as an HTML hidden element. 创建自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写 `SaveViewState` 方法并修改服务器控件的属性来提高效率 `ViewState` 。When you create custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the `SaveViewState` method and modifying the `ViewState` property for your server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

related.span: LinqDataSource Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: LinqDataSource Web Server Control Overview
